content: to humiliate the dog materials 1 skein 50g of gray sandnes garn alfa glitter or similar weight yarn bulky 12ply 3 5mm us 4 double-pointed needles 4mm g crochet hook felt needle & thread minpin sized dog to humiliate size made for minpin head length 18cm circumference in stockinette 30cm abbreviations knitting co = cast on st s = stitch es k = knit p = purl bobble = bind off crocheting chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet increase = increase 2 double crochets in 1 stitch you can find a good tutorial of magic_ring from here http //www hookandneedles com/2008/03/22/amigurumi-tutorial-1/ please do not sell or repost this pattern © amoena 2009 http //theyarnlovingcouple blogspot com/ 1 2 notes you can increase the hat size by adding stitches or needle size when adding make sure the amount of stitches can be divided by four when knitting the tube try to knit more loosely towards the end you don t want to strangle your dog don t you you could also increase the needle size instead if that doesn t work out pattern knitted tube co48 12sts per needle 2k2p around for 10 row knit in stockinette stitch for 10cm 4in 2k2p around for 10 row bobble loosely crocheted ears ch3 and 10dc in magic_ring ch3 = first double_crochet turn cid 1 11 dcs double_crochet increase for 5 times double_crochet cid 1 15 dcs cut yarn leaving a long tail for sewing and pull through cut similar shaped but smaller ears from the felt and sew on sew the ears on the tube at the end of the tighter ribbing back side front side weave in ends humiliate your dog please do not sell or repost this pattern © amoena 2009 http //theyarnlovingcouple blogspot com/ 2 2
